name: btc-message-verifier
description: JavaScript library used to verify a message that had been signed using Bitcoin's approach.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test-node-umd-prod && npm run build-web-prod
scripts.test-node-umd: npm run build-node && env RUNNING_MOCHA="yes" mocha "./test/umd/*.js"
scripts.test-node-umd-prod: npm run build-node-prod && env RUNNING_MOCHA="yes" mocha "./test/umd/*.js"
scripts.coverage-node-html-report: npm run coverage-node && nyc report -r html
